title: PBE help
body: I tried to log onto the pbe today and it just crashed and im having a really hard time finding a link to the pbe client, could you guys check to see if my account is active? Like maybe i got locked out? its carry4sex

replies.body: Crashes won't be caused by your account's activity standing. Can you expand on what the crash looked like or what error message you received when it happened?
I didnt receive one it just froze and i had to force close it. I think my client was just rly old or something so can i try a pbe link from you?

Most of the time when the client freezes, it's caused by a connection drop to the servers. To work toward resolving this, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

i uninstalled my link to the pbe because i thought maybe it was buggy and i could just reinstall it but then i remembered how hard it is to find a legit link to the pbe download :/ so can i have a download link or is it confidential or something?

Ohhh, gotcha. No, it's not confidential or anything like that. You can find a guide for installing the PBE and links to download it [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client)

Let me know if that worked for you.
HHAHA JUST KIDDING THE CLIENT BROKE AS SOON AS I CLOSED AND REOPENED IT BC I WAS TRYING TO BUY BUNDLES SO I WOULD HAVE ALL THE STUFF AND IT WAS BEING WEIRD UGGGH I JUST WANT A PBE ACCOUNT
How was the client being weird?

so like i was trying to buy the bundles for champs so i didn't have to buy them individually you know? IT just had an infinite loading screen. and then also all the skins were unavailable that were released after super galaxy kindred. pls fix this i just wanna play doom bots :[

It sounds like your connection is unstable to the server. I definitely recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), the same one I linked earlier.

Let me know if this helped.
it didnt, but thanks for trying i think its something else, sorry to waste all your time though :[

You didn't waste my time at all!   D:

This is probably something that requires we take a look at your system logs. I'd like you to run a set of logs with our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our Tech Specialists will be more than happy to assist you with further troubleshooting.

Let me know if you have any questions.
can you walk me through how to do that cause i just opened the repair thingy and its really confusing looking
Also, im not entirely sure i have this repair thing going on the pbe client or the regular one this is so confusing omg

The Hextech tool will grab relevant logs regardless of which client you're using. 

Basically select the category *"I'm having technical issues"*, sign in, then fill out the fields it gives you before attaching the **LoL Logs.zip** file and hitting the *Submit* button.

Hope that helps~
Yes it did!! thank you so so so much!! now i can playtest doombots :D
